Title: Determines the amount paid to a pharmacy for certain high cost drugs
Summary: Requires the amount paid to a pharmacy for certain high cost drugs be no more than 2.5% of the total cost of such drug plus any dispensing fees.
LawCode: Amd ยง367-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to determining the amount paid to a pharmacy for certain high cost drugs
